### 1ï¸âƒ£ API Gateway Dockerfile

---

```diff
- 
+ FROM python:3.11-slim
+ 
+ WORKDIR /app
+ 
+ # Install system dependencies
+ RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y \
+     gcc \
+     && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
+ 
+ # Copy requirements and install Python dependencies
+ COPY requirements.txt .
+ RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt
+ 
+ # Copy application code
+ COPY app/ ./app/
+ 
+ # Expose port
+ EXPOSE 8080
+ 
+ # Command to run the application
+ CMD ["uvicorn", "app.main:app", "--host", "0.0.0.0", "--port", "8080", "--reload"]
+ 
```

### 4ï¸âƒ£ Portfolio Frontend Dockerfile

---

```diff
- 
+ FROM node:18-alpine AS base
+ 
+ # Install dependencies only when needed
+ FROM base AS deps
+ RUN apk add --no-cache libc6-compat
+ WORKDIR /app
+ 
+ # Install dependencies based on the preferred package manager
+ COPY package.json pnpm-lock.yaml* ./
+ RUN corepack enable pnpm && pnpm i --frozen-lockfile
+ 
+ # Rebuild the source code only when needed
+ FROM base AS builder
+ WORKDIR /app
+ COPY --from=deps /app/node_modules ./node_modules
+ COPY . .
+ 
+ # Build the application
+ RUN corepack enable pnpm && pnpm run build
+ 
+ # Production image, copy all the files and run next
+ FROM base AS runner
+ WORKDIR /app
+ 
+ ENV NODE_ENV production
+ 
+ RUN addgroup --system --gid 1001 nodejs
+ RUN adduser --system --uid 1001 nextjs
+ 
+ COPY --from=builder /app/public ./public
+ 
+ # Set the correct permission for prerender cache
+ RUN mkdir .next
+ RUN chown nextjs:nodejs .next
+ 
+ # Automatically leverage output traces to reduce image size
+ COPY --from=builder --chown=nextjs:nodejs /app/.next/standalone ./
+ COPY --from=builder --chown=nextjs:nodejs /app/.next/static ./.next/static
+ 
+ USER nextjs
+ 
+ EXPOSE 3000
+ 
+ ENV PORT 3000
+ 
+ CMD ["node", "server.js"]
+ 
```

### ğŸ”§ ì£¼ìš” ì„¤ì • í¬ì¸íŠ¸

```diff
- from typing import Optional
+ from typing import Optional, Dict, Any
  from fastapi import HTTPException
  import httpx
  from app.domain.model.service_type import SERVICE_URLS, ServiceType
  import logging 
+ import json
+ 
+ logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)
  
  class ServiceProxy:
+     """ë§ˆì´í¬ë¡œì„œë¹„ìŠ¤ í”„ë¡ì‹œ í´ë˜ìŠ¤"""
+     
      def __init__(self, service_type: ServiceType):
          self.service_type = service_type
          self.base_url = SERVICE_URLS[service_type]
+         self.timeout = 30.0  # 30ì´ˆ íƒ€ì„ì•„ì›ƒ
+         
+         if not self.base_url:
+             raise ValueError(f"Service URL not configured for {service_type}")
+ 
+     def _filter_headers(self, headers: Dict[str, str]) -> Dict[str, str]:
+         """í´ë¼ì´ì–¸íŠ¸ í—¤ë”ë¥¼ í•„í„°ë§í•˜ì—¬ ë°±ì—”ë“œë¡œ ì „ë‹¬í•  í—¤ë”ë§Œ ì¶”ì¶œ"""
+         # ì œì™¸í•  í—¤ë”ë“¤
+         excluded_headers = {
+             'host', 'content-length', 'connection', 'accept-encoding',
+             'user-agent', 'origin', 'referer'
+         }
+         
+         filtered = {}
+         for key, value in headers.items():
+             if key.lower() not in excluded_headers:
+                 filtered[key] = value
+                 
+         return filtered
  
      async def request(
          self,
          method: str,
          path: str,
-         headers: httpx.Headers,
-         body: Optional[bytes] = None
-     ):
-         url = f"{self.base_url}/{path}"
-         async with httpx.AsyncClient() as client:
+         headers: Optional[Dict[str, str]] = None,
+         body: Optional[bytes] = None,
+         query_params: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None
+     ) -> httpx.Response:
+         """
+         ë°±ì—”ë“œ ì„œë¹„ìŠ¤ë¡œ HTTP ìš”ì²­ì„ í”„ë¡ì‹œ
+         
+         Args:
+             method: HTTP ë©”ì„œë“œ (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, PATCH)
+             path: ìš”ì²­ ê²½ë¡œ
+             headers: HTTP í—¤ë”
+             body: ìš”ì²­ ë°”ë””
+             query_params: ì¿¼ë¦¬ íŒŒë¼ë¯¸í„°
+             
+         Returns:
+             httpx.Response: ë°±ì—”ë“œ ì„œë¹„ìŠ¤ ì‘ë‹µ
+             
+         Raises:
+             HTTPException: HTTP ì—ëŸ¬ ë°œìƒ ì‹œ
+         """
+         # URL êµ¬ì„±
+         url = f"{self.base_url.rstrip('/')}/{path.lstrip('/')}"
+         
+         # í—¤ë” í•„í„°ë§
+         headers_to_send = self._filter_headers(headers or {})
+         
+         logger.info(f"ğŸ”„ Proxying {method} {url}")
+         
+         async with httpx.AsyncClient(timeout=self.timeout) as client:
              try:
                  response = await client.request(
                      method=method,
                      url=url,
                      headers=headers_to_send,
-                     content=body
+                     content=body,
+                     params=query_params
                  )
+                 
+                 logger.info(f"âœ… Response {response.status_code} from {self.service_type}")
                  return response
+                 
+             except httpx.TimeoutException:
+                 logger.error(f"â° Timeout calling {self.service_type} service")
+                 raise HTTPException(
+                     status_code=504,
+                     detail=f"Timeout calling {self.service_type} service"
+                 )
+             except httpx.ConnectError:
+                 logger.error(f"ğŸ”Œ Connection error to {self.service_type} service")
+                 raise HTTPException(
+                     status_code=503,
+                     detail=f"Service {self.service_type} unavailable"
+                 )
              except httpx.HTTPStatusError as e:
+                 logger.error(f"âŒ HTTP error {e.response.status_code} from {self.service_type}")
                  raise HTTPException(
                      status_code=e.response.status_code,
+                     detail=f"Error from {self.service_type} service"
+                 )
+             except Exception as e:
+                 logger.error(f"ğŸ’¥ Unexpected error calling {self.service_type}: {str(e)}")
+                 raise HTTPException(
+                     status_code=502,
+                     detail=f"Bad gateway - {self.service_type} service error"
+                 )
```

### 2ï¸âƒ£ main.py ëª¨ë“  HTTP ë©”ì„œë“œ ì™„ì„±

```diff
- 
+ import json
+ from typing import Dict, Any, Optional
+ from fastapi import APIRouter, FastAPI, Request, HTTPException
+ from fastapi.middleware.cors import CORSMiddleware
+ from fastapi.responses import Response
+ import os
+ import logging
+ import sys
+ from dotenv import load_dotenv
+ from app.domain.model.service_proxy import ServiceProxy
+ from contextlib import asynccontextmanager
+ from app.domain.model.service_type import ServiceType
+ 
+ # âœ… ë¡œê¹… ì„¤ì •
+ logging.basicConfig(
+     level=logging.INFO,
+     format='%(asctime)s - %(name)s - %(levelname)s - %(message)s',
+     handlers=[logging.StreamHandler(sys.stdout)]
+ )
+ logger = logging.getLogger("gateway_api")
+ 
+ # âœ… .env íŒŒì¼ ë¡œë“œ
+ load_dotenv()
+ 
+ # âœ… ì• í”Œë¦¬ì¼€ì´ì…˜ ì‹œì‘ ì‹œ ì‹¤í–‰
+ @asynccontextmanager
+ async def lifespan(app: FastAPI):
+     logger.info("ğŸš€ Gateway API ì„œë¹„ìŠ¤ ì‹œì‘")
+     logger.info(f"ğŸŒ í™˜ê²½: {os.getenv('NODE_ENV', 'development')}")
+     logger.info(f"ğŸ”— Auth Service: {os.getenv('AUTH_SERVICE_URL')}")
+     logger.info(f"ğŸ“ Blog Service: {os.getenv('BLOG_SERVICE_URL')}")
+     yield
+     logger.info("ğŸ›‘ Gateway API ì„œë¹„ìŠ¤ ì¢…ë£Œ")
+ 
+ # âœ… FastAPI ì•± ìƒì„± 
+ app = FastAPI(
+     title="Jinmini Portfolio API Gateway",
+     description="API Gateway for jinmini.com - í¬íŠ¸í´ë¦¬ì˜¤ & ë¸”ë¡œê·¸ ë§ˆì´í¬ë¡œì„œë¹„ìŠ¤",
+     version="1.0.0",
+     lifespan=lifespan
+ )
+ 
+ # âœ… CORS ì„¤ì •
+ allowed_origins = os.getenv("CORS_ORIGINS", "http://localhost:3000").split(",")
+ app.add_middleware(
+     CORSMiddleware,
+     allow_origins=allowed_origins,
+     allow_credentials=True,
+     allow_methods=["GET", "POST", "PUT", "DELETE", "PATCH", "OPTIONS"],
+     allow_headers=["*"],
+ )
+ 
+ # âœ… ë©”ì¸ ë¼ìš°í„° ìƒì„±
+ gateway_router = APIRouter(prefix="", tags=["Gateway"])
+ 
+ # âœ… ìœ í‹¸ë¦¬í‹° í•¨ìˆ˜ë“¤
+ async def _extract_request_data(request: Request) -> tuple[Dict[str, str], bytes, Dict[str, Any]]:
+     """ìš”ì²­ì—ì„œ í—¤ë”, ë°”ë””, ì¿¼ë¦¬ íŒŒë¼ë¯¸í„° ì¶”ì¶œ"""
+     # í—¤ë” ì¶”ì¶œ
+     headers = {name: value for name, value in request.headers.items()}
+     
+     # ë°”ë”” ì¶”ì¶œ
+     body = await request.body()
+     
+     # ì¿¼ë¦¬ íŒŒë¼ë¯¸í„° ì¶”ì¶œ
+     query_params = dict(request.query_params)
+     
+     return headers, body, query_params
+ 
+ def _validate_service_type(service: str) -> ServiceType:
+     """ì„œë¹„ìŠ¤ íƒ€ì… ê²€ì¦"""
+     try:
+         return ServiceType(service)
+     except ValueError:
+         available_services = [s.value for s in ServiceType]
+         raise HTTPException(
+             status_code=400,
+             detail=f"Invalid service '{service}'. Available services: {available_services}"
+         )
+ 
+ async def _proxy_request(method: str, service: ServiceType, path: str, request: Request) -> Response:
+     """ê³µí†µ í”„ë¡ì‹œ ìš”ì²­ ì²˜ë¦¬"""
+     try:
+         headers, body, query_params = await _extract_request_data(request)
+         
+         proxy = ServiceProxy(service_type=service)
+         response = await proxy.request(
+             method=method,
+             path=path,
+             headers=headers,
+             body=body if body else None,
+             query_params=query_params if query_params else None
+         )
+         
+         # ì‘ë‹µ í—¤ë”ì—ì„œ ë¶ˆí•„ìš”í•œ í—¤ë” ì œê±°
+         excluded_response_headers = {'transfer-encoding', 'connection', 'keep-alive'}
+         response_headers = {
+             key: value for key, value in response.headers.items()
+             if key.lower() not in excluded_response_headers
+         }
+         
+         return Response(
+             content=response.content,
+             status_code=response.status_code,
+             headers=response_headers,
+             media_type=response.headers.get('content-type')
+         )
+         
+     except Exception as e:
+         logger.error(f"ğŸ’¥ Proxy error for {method} /{service}/{path}: {str(e)}")
+         if isinstance(e, HTTPException):
+             raise e
+         raise HTTPException(status_code=500, detail="Internal gateway error")
+ 
+ # âœ… í—¬ìŠ¤ ì²´í¬ ì—”ë“œí¬ì¸íŠ¸
+ @gateway_router.get("/health", summary="í—¬ìŠ¤ ì²´í¬")
+ async def health_check():
+     """API Gateway ìƒíƒœ í™•ì¸"""
+     return {
+         "status": "healthy",
+         "service": "API Gateway",
+         "version": "1.0.0"
+     }
+ 
+ # âœ… ì„œë¹„ìŠ¤ ìƒíƒœ í™•ì¸ ì—”ë“œí¬ì¸íŠ¸
+ @gateway_router.get("/status", summary="ì „ì²´ ì„œë¹„ìŠ¤ ìƒíƒœ í™•ì¸")
+ async def service_status():
+     """ëª¨ë“  ë§ˆì´í¬ë¡œì„œë¹„ìŠ¤ ìƒíƒœ í™•ì¸"""
+     status = {"gateway": "healthy", "services": {}}
+     
+     for service_type in ServiceType:
+         try:
+             proxy = ServiceProxy(service_type=service_type)
+             response = await proxy.request("GET", "health", {})
+             status["services"][service_type.value] = {
+                 "status": "healthy" if response.status_code == 200 else "unhealthy",
+                 "status_code": response.status_code
+             }
+         except Exception as e:
+             status["services"][service_type.value] = {
+                 "status": "error",
+                 "error": str(e)
+             }
+     
+     return status
+ 
+ # âœ… HTTP ë©”ì„œë“œë³„ ë¼ìš°í„°
+ 
+ @gateway_router.get("/{service}/{path:path}", summary="GET í”„ë¡ì‹œ")
+ async def proxy_get(service: str, path: str, request: Request):
+     """GET ìš”ì²­ í”„ë¡ì‹œ"""
+     service_type = _validate_service_type(service)
+     return await _proxy_request("GET", service_type, path, request)
+ 
+ @gateway_router.post("/{service}/{path:path}", summary="POST í”„ë¡ì‹œ")
+ async def proxy_post(service: str, path: str, request: Request):
+     """POST ìš”ì²­ í”„ë¡ì‹œ"""
+     service_type = _validate_service_type(service)
+     return await _proxy_request("POST", service_type, path, request)
+ 
+ @gateway_router.put("/{service}/{path:path}", summary="PUT í”„ë¡ì‹œ")
+ async def proxy_put(service: str, path: str, request: Request):
+     """PUT ìš”ì²­ í”„ë¡ì‹œ"""
+     service_type = _validate_service_type(service)
+     return await _proxy_request("PUT", service_type, path, request)
+ 
+ @gateway_router.delete("/{service}/{path:path}", summary="DELETE í”„ë¡ì‹œ")
+ async def proxy_delete(service: str, path: str, request: Request):
+     """DELETE ìš”ì²­ í”„ë¡ì‹œ"""
+     service_type = _validate_service_type(service)
+     return await _proxy_request("DELETE", service_type, path, request)
+ 
+ @gateway_router.patch("/{service}/{path:path}", summary="PATCH í”„ë¡ì‹œ")
+ async def proxy_patch(service: str, path: str, request: Request):
+     """PATCH ìš”ì²­ í”„ë¡ì‹œ"""
+     service_type = _validate_service_type(service)
+     return await _proxy_request("PATCH", service_type, path, request)
+ 
+ # âœ… ë¼ìš°í„° ë“±ë¡
+ app.include_router(gateway_router)
+ 
+ # âœ… ì „ì—­ ì˜ˆì™¸ ì²˜ë¦¬
+ @app.exception_handler(HTTPException)
+ async def http_exception_handler(request: Request, exc: HTTPException):
+     logger.error(f"âŒ HTTP Exception: {exc.status_code} - {exc.detail}")
+     return {"error": exc.detail, "status_code": exc.status_code}
+ 
+ @app.exception_handler(Exception)
+ async def general_exception_handler(request: Request, exc: Exception):
+     logger.error(f"ğŸ’¥ Unhandled Exception: {str(exc)}")
+     return {"error": "Internal server error", "status_code": 500}
+ 
+ # âœ… ì„œë²„ ì‹¤í–‰
+ if __name__ == "__main__":
+     import uvicorn
+     port = int(os.getenv("PORT", 8080))
+     uvicorn.run("app.main:app", host="0.0.0.0", port=port, reload=True) 
```

```diff
+ uvicorn[standard]==0.24.0
+ httpx==0.25.2
```

### **ğŸ”¥ Phase 3: Blog Service êµ¬í˜„ (High Priority)**

#### **Step 3.1: ë°ì´í„°ë² ì´ìŠ¤ ìŠ¤í‚¤ë§ˆ ì„¤ê³„**
```sql
-- ì¹´í…Œê³ ë¦¬ í…Œì´ë¸”
CREATE TABLE categories (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    slug VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL
);

-- ê²Œì‹œê¸€ í…Œì´ë¸”  
CREATE TABLE posts (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    content TEXT NOT NULL,
    summary TEXT,
    post_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, -- 'dev' or 'esg'
    category_id INTEGER REFERENCES categories(id),
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

-- ëŒ“ê¸€ í…Œì´ë¸”
CREATE TABLE comments (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INTEGER REFERENCES posts(id),
    author_name VARCHAR(100),
    content TEXT NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
```
**ì˜ˆìƒ ì‹œê°„**: 45ë¶„

+     updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
+ );
+

+ CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION update_updated_at_column()
+ RETURNS TRIGGER AS $$
+ BEGIN
+     NEW.updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
+     RETURN NEW;
+ END;
+ $$ language 'plpgsql';

+     FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION update_updated_at_column();

### 3ï¸âƒ£ Auth Service í´ë” êµ¬ì¡° ìƒì„±

---

```diff
- 
+ from fastapi import FastAPI
+ from fastapi.middleware.cors import CORSMiddleware
+ import os
+ import logging
+ import sys
+ from contextlib import asynccontextmanager
+ from dotenv import load_dotenv
+ 
+ from app.core.config import settings
+ from app.core.database import engine, Base
+ from app.routers import auth
+ 
+ # ë¡œê¹… ì„¤ì •
+ logging.basicConfig(
+     level=logging.INFO,
+     format='%(asctime)s - %(name)s - %(levelname)s - %(message)s',
+     handlers=[logging.StreamHandler(sys.stdout)]
+ )
+ logger = logging.getLogger("auth_service")
+ 
+ # .env íŒŒì¼ ë¡œë“œ
+ load_dotenv()
+ 
+ # ì• í”Œë¦¬ì¼€ì´ì…˜ ì‹œì‘ ì‹œ ì‹¤í–‰
+ @asynccontextmanager
+ async def lifespan(app: FastAPI):
+     logger.info("ğŸ” Auth Service ì‹œì‘")
+     logger.info(f"ğŸ—„ï¸ Database URL: {settings.DATABASE_URL}")
+     yield
+     logger.info("ğŸ” Auth Service ì¢…ë£Œ")
+ 
+ # FastAPI ì•± ìƒì„±
+ app = FastAPI(
+     title="Jinmini Auth Service",
+     description="ì¸ì¦ ë° ì‚¬ìš©ì ê´€ë¦¬ ë§ˆì´í¬ë¡œì„œë¹„ìŠ¤",
+     version="1.0.0",
+     lifespan=lifespan
+ )
+ 
+ # CORS ì„¤ì •
+ app.add_middleware(
+     CORSMiddleware,
+     allow_origins=["*"],  # Gatewayì—ì„œ ì´ë¯¸ CORS ì²˜ë¦¬í•˜ì§€ë§Œ ì•ˆì „ì„ ìœ„í•´
+     allow_credentials=True,
+     allow_methods=["GET", "POST", "PUT", "DELETE"],
+     allow_headers=["*"],
+ )
+ 
+ # ë¼ìš°í„° ë“±ë¡
+ app.include_router(auth.router, prefix="/auth", tags=["Authentication"])
+ 
+ # í—¬ìŠ¤ ì²´í¬
+ @app.get("/health")
+ async def health_check():
+     """Auth Service ìƒíƒœ í™•ì¸"""
+     return {
+         "status": "healthy",
+         "service": "Auth Service",
+         "version": "1.0.0"
+     }
+ 
+ # ì„œë²„ ì‹¤í–‰
+ if __name__ == "__main__":
+     import uvicorn
+     port = int(os.getenv("PORT", 8101))
+     uvicorn.run("app.main:app", host="0.0.0.0", port=port, reload=True)
+ 
```

### 4ï¸âƒ£ Core ì„¤ì • íŒŒì¼ë“¤

---

```diff
- 
+ from pydantic_settings import BaseSettings
+ from typing import Optional
+ import os
+ 
+ class Settings(BaseSettings):
+     # ë°ì´í„°ë² ì´ìŠ¤ ì„¤ì •
+     DATABASE_URL: str = os.getenv(
+         "DATABASE_URL", 
+         "postgresql://admin:admin123@localhost:5432/jinmini_portfolio"
+     )
+     
+     # JWT ì„¤ì •
+     JWT_SECRET_KEY: str = os.getenv("JWT_SECRET_KEY", "your-super-secret-jwt-key-change-this-in-production")
+     JWT_ALGORITHM: str = os.getenv("JWT_ALGORITHM", "HS256")
+     ACCESS_TOKEN_EXPIRE_MINUTES: int = int(os.getenv("ACCESS_TOKEN_EXPIRE_MINUTES", "30"))
+     
+     # Redis ì„¤ì •
+     REDIS_URL: str = os.getenv("REDIS_URL", "redis://localhost:6379")
+     
+     # ì•± ì„¤ì •
+     APP_NAME: str = "Jinmini Auth Service"
+     APP_VERSION: str = "1.0.0"
+     DEBUG: bool = os.getenv("DEBUG", "false").lower() == "true"
+     
+     class Config:
+         env_file = ".env"
+ 
+ settings = Settings() 
```

---

```diff
- 
+ from sqlalchemy.ext.asyncio import create_async_engine, AsyncSession, async_sessionmaker
+ from sqlalchemy.ext.declarative import declarative_base
+ from typing import AsyncGenerator
+ from app.core.config import settings
+ 
+ # ë¹„ë™ê¸° ë°ì´í„°ë² ì´ìŠ¤ ì—”ì§„
+ engine = create_async_engine(
+     settings.DATABASE_URL,
+     echo=settings.DEBUG,
+     pool_pre_ping=True,
+     pool_size=10,
+     max_overflow=20
+ )
+ 
+ # ì„¸ì…˜ ë©”ì´ì»¤
+ AsyncSessionLocal = async_sessionmaker(
+     engine,
+     class_=AsyncSession,
+     expire_on_commit=False
+ )
+ 
+ # ë² ì´ìŠ¤ í´ë˜ìŠ¤
+ Base = declarative_base()
+ 
+ # ì˜ì¡´ì„± ì£¼ì…ìš© ë°ì´í„°ë² ì´ìŠ¤ ì„¸ì…˜
+ async def get_db() -> AsyncGenerator[AsyncSession, None]:
+     async with AsyncSessionLocal() as session:
+         try:
+             yield session
+         except Exception:
+             await session.rollback()
+             raise
+         finally:
+             await session.close() 
```

---

```diff
- 
+ from datetime import datetime, timedelta
+ from typing import Optional, Union
+ from jose import JWTError, jwt
+ from passlib.context import CryptContext
+ from fastapi import HTTPException, status
+ from app.core.config import settings
+ 
+ # ë¹„ë°€ë²ˆí˜¸ í•´ì‹±
+ pwd_context = CryptContext(schemes=["bcrypt"], deprecated="auto")
+ 
+ def verify_password(plain_password: str, hashed_password: str) -> bool:
+     """ë¹„ë°€ë²ˆí˜¸ ê²€ì¦"""
+     return pwd_context.verify(plain_password, hashed_password)
+ 
+ def get_password_hash(password: str) -> str:
+     """ë¹„ë°€ë²ˆí˜¸ í•´ì‹±"""
+     return pwd_context.hash(password)
+ 
+ def create_access_token(data: dict, expires_delta: Optional[timedelta] = None) -> str:
+     """JWT ì•¡ì„¸ìŠ¤ í† í° ìƒì„±"""
+     to_encode = data.copy()
+     
+     if expires_delta:
+         expire = datetime.utcnow() + expires_delta
+     else:
+         expire = datetime.utcnow() + timedelta(minutes=settings.ACCESS_TOKEN_EXPIRE_MINUTES)
+     
+     to_encode.update({"exp": expire})
+     
+     encoded_jwt = jwt.encode(
+         to_encode, 
+         settings.JWT_SECRET_KEY, 
+         algorithm=settings.JWT_ALGORITHM
+     )
+     
+     return encoded_jwt
+ 
+ def verify_token(token: str) -> dict:
+     """JWT í† í° ê²€ì¦"""
+     try:
+         payload = jwt.decode(
+             token, 
+             settings.JWT_SECRET_KEY, 
+             algorithms=[settings.JWT_ALGORITHM]
+         )
+         
+         user_id: int = payload.get("sub")
+         if user_id is None:
+             raise HTTPException(
+                 status_code=status.HTTP_401_UNAUTHORIZED,
+                 detail="í† í°ì—ì„œ ì‚¬ìš©ì ì •ë³´ë¥¼ ì°¾ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤",
+                 headers={"WWW-Authenticate": "Bearer"},
+             )
+         
+         return payload
+         
+     except JWTError:
+         raise HTTPException(
+             status_code=status.HTTP_401_UNAUTHORIZED,
+             detail="í† í° ê²€ì¦ì— ì‹¤íŒ¨í–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤",
+             headers={"WWW-Authenticate": "Bearer"},
+         )
+ 
+ def decode_access_token(token: str) -> Optional[dict]:
+     """í† í° ë””ì½”ë“œ (ì—ëŸ¬ ì—†ì´)"""
+     try:
+         payload = jwt.decode(
+             token, 
+             settings.JWT_SECRET_KEY, 
+             algorithms=[settings.JWT_ALGORITHM]
+         )
+         return payload
+     except JWTError:
+         return None 
```

```diff
+ from sqlalchemy import Column, Integer, String, Boolean, DateTime
+ from sqlalchemy.sql import func
+ from app.core.database import Base
+ 
+ class User(Base):
+     __tablename__ = "users"
+     
+     id = Column(Integer, primary_key=True, index=True)
+     email = Column(String(255), unique=True, index=True, nullable=False)
+     password_hash = Column(String(255), nullable=False)
+     full_name = Column(String(100))
+     is_active = Column(Boolean, default=True)
+     is_admin = Column(Boolean, default=False)
+     created_at = Column(DateTime(timezone=True), server_default=func.now())
+     updated_at = Column(DateTime(timezone=True), server_default=func.now(), onupdate=func.now()) 
```

```diff
- 
+ from pydantic import BaseModel, EmailStr
+ from typing import Optional
+ from datetime import datetime
+ 
+ # ì‚¬ìš©ì ê¸°ë³¸ ìŠ¤í‚¤ë§ˆ
+ class UserBase(BaseModel):
+     email: EmailStr
+     full_name: Optional[str] = None
+     is_active: bool = True
+ 
+ # ì‚¬ìš©ì ìƒì„± ìŠ¤í‚¤ë§ˆ
+ class UserCreate(UserBase):
+     password: str
+     
+     class Config:
+         json_schema_extra = {
+             "example": {
+                 "email": "user@example.com",
+                 "password": "strongpassword123",
+                 "full_name": "í™ê¸¸ë™"
+             }
+         }
+ 
+ # ì‚¬ìš©ì ì‘ë‹µ ìŠ¤í‚¤ë§ˆ
+ class UserResponse(UserBase):
+     id: int
+     is_admin: bool
+     created_at: datetime
+     updated_at: datetime
+     
+     class Config:
+         from_attributes = True
+ 
+ # ë¡œê·¸ì¸ ìŠ¤í‚¤ë§ˆ
+ class UserLogin(BaseModel):
+     email: EmailStr
+     password: str
+     
+     class Config:
+         json_schema_extra = {
+             "example": {
+                 "email": "admin@jinmini.com",
+                 "password": "admin123"
+             }
+         }
+ 
+ # í† í° ìŠ¤í‚¤ë§ˆ
+ class Token(BaseModel):
+     access_token: str
+     token_type: str = "bearer"
+     user: UserResponse
+ 
+ # í† í° ë°ì´í„° ìŠ¤í‚¤ë§ˆ
+ class TokenData(BaseModel):
+     user_id: Optional[int] = None 
```

```diff
+ from fastapi import APIRouter, Depends, HTTPException, status
+ from fastapi.security import HTTPBearer, HTTPAuthorizationCredentials
+ from sqlalchemy.ext.asyncio import AsyncSession
+ from sqlalchemy import select
+ from typing import Optional
+ 
+ from app.core.database import get_db
+ from app.core.security import (
+     verify_password, 
+     get_password_hash, 
+     create_access_token, 
+     verify_token
+ )
+ from app.models.user import User
+ from app.schemas.user import UserCreate, UserLogin, UserResponse, Token
+ import logging
+ 
+ logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)
+ router = APIRouter()
+ security = HTTPBearer()
+ 
+ # í˜„ì¬ ì‚¬ìš©ì ê°€ì ¸ì˜¤ê¸° ì˜ì¡´ì„±
+ async def get_current_user(
+     credentials: HTTPAuthorizationCredentials = Depends(security),
+     db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db)
+ ) -> User:
+     """JWT í† í°ì—ì„œ í˜„ì¬ ì‚¬ìš©ì ì •ë³´ ì¶”ì¶œ"""
+     token = credentials.credentials
+     payload = verify_token(token)
+     
+     user_id = payload.get("sub")
+     if user_id is None:
+         raise HTTPException(
+             status_code=status.HTTP_401_UNAUTHORIZED,
+             detail="í† í°ì—ì„œ ì‚¬ìš©ì IDë¥¼ ì°¾ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤"
+         )
+     
+     result = await db.execute(select(User).where(User.id == int(user_id)))
+     user = result.scalar_one_or_none()
+     
+     if user is None:
+         raise HTTPException(
+             status_code=status.HTTP_401_UNAUTHORIZED,
+             detail="ì‚¬ìš©ìë¥¼ ì°¾ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤"
+         )
+     
+     return user
+ 
+ # ê´€ë¦¬ì ê¶Œí•œ í™•ì¸ ì˜ì¡´ì„±
+ async def get_current_admin_user(
+     current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user)
+ ) -> User:
+     """ê´€ë¦¬ì ê¶Œí•œ í™•ì¸"""
+     if not current_user.is_admin:
+         raise HTTPException(
+             status_code=status.HTTP_403_FORBIDDEN,
+             detail="ê´€ë¦¬ì ê¶Œí•œì´ í•„ìš”í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤"
+         )
+     return current_user
+ 
+ @router.post("/register", response_model=UserResponse, summary="íšŒì›ê°€ì…")
+ async def register_user(
+     user_data: UserCreate,
+     db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db)
+ ):
+     """
+     ìƒˆ ì‚¬ìš©ì ë“±ë¡
+     
+     - **email**: ì‚¬ìš©ì ì´ë©”ì¼ (ê³ ìœ ê°’)
+     - **password**: ë¹„ë°€ë²ˆí˜¸ (8ì ì´ìƒ ê¶Œì¥)
+     - **full_name**: ì‚¬ìš©ì ì´ë¦„ (ì„ íƒì‚¬í•­)
+     """
+     # ì´ë©”ì¼ ì¤‘ë³µ í™•ì¸
+     result = await db.execute(select(User).where(User.email == user_data.email))
+     existing_user = result.scalar_one_or_none()
+     
+     if existing_user:
+         raise HTTPException(
+             status_code=status.HTTP_400_BAD_REQUEST,
+             detail="ì´ë¯¸ ë“±ë¡ëœ ì´ë©”ì¼ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤"
+         )
+     
+     # ë¹„ë°€ë²ˆí˜¸ í•´ì‹±
+     hashed_password = get_password_hash(user_data.password)
+     
+     # ìƒˆ ì‚¬ìš©ì ìƒì„±
+     new_user = User(
+         email=user_data.email,
+         password_hash=hashed_password,
+         full_name=user_data.full_name,
+         is_active=user_data.is_active
+     )
+     
+     db.add(new_user)
+     await db.commit()
+     await db.refresh(new_user)
+     
+     logger.info(f"âœ… ìƒˆ ì‚¬ìš©ì ë“±ë¡: {user_data.email}")
+     return new_user
+ 
+ @router.post("/login", response_model=Token, summary="ë¡œê·¸ì¸")
+ async def login_user(
+     user_data: UserLogin,
+     db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db)
+ ):
+     """
+     ì‚¬ìš©ì ë¡œê·¸ì¸
+     
+     - **email**: ë“±ë¡ëœ ì´ë©”ì¼
+     - **password**: ë¹„ë°€ë²ˆí˜¸
+     
+     ì„±ê³µ ì‹œ JWT ì•¡ì„¸ìŠ¤ í† í° ë°˜í™˜
+     """
+     # ì‚¬ìš©ì ì¡°íšŒ
+     result = await db.execute(select(User).where(User.email == user_data.email))
+     user = result.scalar_one_or_none()
+     
+     if not user:
+         raise HTTPException(
+             status_code=status.HTTP_401_UNAUTHORIZED,
+             detail="ì´ë©”ì¼ ë˜ëŠ” ë¹„ë°€ë²ˆí˜¸ê°€ ì˜¬ë°”ë¥´ì§€ ì•ŠìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤"
+         )
+     
+     # ë¹„ë°€ë²ˆí˜¸ í™•ì¸
+     if not verify_password(user_data.password, user.password_hash):
+         raise HTTPException(
+             status_code=status.HTTP_401_UNAUTHORIZED,
+             detail="ì´ë©”ì¼ ë˜ëŠ” ë¹„ë°€ë²ˆí˜¸ê°€ ì˜¬ë°”ë¥´ì§€ ì•ŠìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤"
+         )
+     
+     # í™œì„± ì‚¬ìš©ì í™•ì¸
+     if not user.is_active:
+         raise HTTPException(
+             status_code=status.HTTP_401_UNAUTHORIZED,
+             detail="ë¹„í™œì„±í™”ëœ ê³„ì •ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤"
+         )
+     
+     # JWT í† í° ìƒì„±
+     access_token = create_access_token(data={"sub": str(user.id)})
+     
+     logger.info(f"âœ… ì‚¬ìš©ì ë¡œê·¸ì¸: {user.email}")
+     
+     return {
+         "access_token": access_token,
+         "token_type": "bearer",
+         "user": user
+     }
+ 
+ @router.get("/me", response_model=UserResponse, summary="í˜„ì¬ ì‚¬ìš©ì ì •ë³´")
+ async def get_current_user_info(
+     current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user)
+ ):
+     """
+     í˜„ì¬ ë¡œê·¸ì¸í•œ ì‚¬ìš©ìì˜ ì •ë³´ ì¡°íšŒ
+     
+     JWT í† í°ì´ í•„ìš”í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤.
+     """
+     return current_user
+ 
+ @router.get("/users", response_model=list[UserResponse], summary="ì‚¬ìš©ì ëª©ë¡ ì¡°íšŒ (ê´€ë¦¬ì)")
+ async def get_users(
+     skip: int = 0,
+     limit: int = 100,
+     current_admin: User = Depends(get_current_admin_user),
+     db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db)
+ ):
+     """
+     ëª¨ë“  ì‚¬ìš©ì ëª©ë¡ ì¡°íšŒ (ê´€ë¦¬ìë§Œ ê°€ëŠ¥)
+     
+     - **skip**: ê±´ë„ˆë›¸ ë ˆì½”ë“œ ìˆ˜
+     - **limit**: ê°€ì ¸ì˜¬ ìµœëŒ€ ë ˆì½”ë“œ ìˆ˜
+     """
+     result = await db.execute(
+         select(User)
+         .offset(skip)
+         .limit(limit)
+     )
+     users = result.scalars().all()
+     
+     logger.info(f"ğŸ‘¥ ì‚¬ìš©ì ëª©ë¡ ì¡°íšŒ: {len(users)}ëª…")
+     return users
+ 
+ @router.put("/users/{user_id}/status", response_model=UserResponse, summary="ì‚¬ìš©ì ìƒíƒœ ë³€ê²½ (ê´€ë¦¬ì)")
+ async def update_user_status(
+     user_id: int,
+     is_active: bool,
+     current_admin: User = Depends(get_current_admin_user),
+     db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db)
+ ):
+     """
+     ì‚¬ìš©ì í™œì„±/ë¹„í™œì„± ìƒíƒœ ë³€ê²½ (ê´€ë¦¬ìë§Œ ê°€ëŠ¥)
+     
+     - **user_id**: ëŒ€ìƒ ì‚¬ìš©ì ID
+     - **is_active**: í™œì„±í™” ì—¬ë¶€ (true/false)
+     """
+     result = await db.execute(select(User).where(User.id == user_id))
+     user = result.scalar_one_or_none()
+     
+     if not user:
+         raise HTTPException(
+             status_code=status.HTTP_404_NOT_FOUND,
+             detail="ì‚¬ìš©ìë¥¼ ì°¾ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤"
+         )
+     
+     user.is_active = is_active
+     await db.commit()
+     await db.refresh(user)
+     
+     status_text = "í™œì„±í™”" if is_active else "ë¹„í™œì„±í™”"
+     logger.info(f"ğŸ”„ ì‚¬ìš©ì ìƒíƒœ ë³€ê²½: {user.email} -> {status_text}")
+     
+     return user 
```

```diff
+ from fastapi import FastAPI
+ from fastapi.middleware.cors import CORSMiddleware
+ import os
+ import logging
+ import sys
+ from contextlib import asynccontextmanager
+ from dotenv import load_dotenv
+ 
+ from app.core.config import settings
+ from app.routers import posts, categories, comments
+ 
+ # ë¡œê¹… ì„¤ì •
+ logging.basicConfig(
+     level=logging.INFO,
+     format='%(asctime)s - %(name)s - %(levelname)s - %(message)s',
+     handlers=[logging.StreamHandler(sys.stdout)]
+ )
+ logger = logging.getLogger("blog_service")
+ 
+ # .env íŒŒì¼ ë¡œë“œ
+ load_dotenv()
+ 
+ # ì• í”Œë¦¬ì¼€ì´ì…˜ ì‹œì‘ ì‹œ ì‹¤í–‰
+ @asynccontextmanager
+ async def lifespan(app: FastAPI):
+     logger.info("ğŸ“ Blog Service ì‹œì‘")
+     logger.info(f"ğŸ—„ï¸ Database URL: {settings.DATABASE_URL}")
+     yield
+     logger.info("ğŸ“ Blog Service ì¢…ë£Œ")
+ 
+ # FastAPI ì•± ìƒì„±
+ app = FastAPI(
+     title="Jinmini Blog Service",
+     description="ë¸”ë¡œê·¸ ë° ì½˜í…ì¸  ê´€ë¦¬ ë§ˆì´í¬ë¡œì„œë¹„ìŠ¤ (ê°œë°œ/ESG í†µí•©)",
+     version="1.0.0",
+     lifespan=lifespan
+ )
+ 
+ # CORS ì„¤ì •
+ app.add_middleware(
+     CORSMiddleware,
+     allow_origins=["*"],  # Gatewayì—ì„œ ì´ë¯¸ CORS ì²˜ë¦¬í•˜ì§€ë§Œ ì•ˆì „ì„ ìœ„í•´

+     allow_methods=["GET", "POST", "PUT", "DELETE"],
+     allow_headers=["*"],
+ )

+ app.include_router(posts.router, prefix="/posts", tags=["Posts"])

+     import uvicorn

+     uvicorn.run("app.main:app", host="0.0.0.0", port=port, reload=True)
```

### 3ï¸âƒ£ Core ì„¤ì • íŒŒì¼ë“¤

```diff

+ from sqlalchemy.ext.asyncio import create_async_engine, AsyncSession, async_sessionmaker
+ from sqlalchemy.ext.declarative import declarative_base
+ from typing import AsyncGenerator
+ from app.core.config import settings
+ 
+ # ë¹„ë™ê¸° ë°ì´í„°ë² ì´ìŠ¤ ì—”ì§„
+ engine = create_async_engine(
+     settings.DATABASE_URL,
+     echo=settings.DEBUG,
+     pool_pre_ping=True,
+     pool_size=10,
+     max_overflow=20
+ )
+ 
+ # ì„¸ì…˜ ë©”ì´ì»¤
+ AsyncSessionLocal = async_sessionmaker(
+     engine,
+     class_=AsyncSession,
+     expire_on_commit=False
+ )
+ 
+ # ë² ì´ìŠ¤ í´ë˜ìŠ¤
+ Base = declarative_base()
+ 
+ # ì˜ì¡´ì„± ì£¼ì…ìš© ë°ì´í„°ë² ì´ìŠ¤ ì„¸ì…˜
+ async def get_db() -> AsyncGenerator[AsyncSession, None]:
+     async with AsyncSessionLocal() as session:
+         try:
+             yield session
+         except Exception:
+             await session.rollback()
+             raise
+         finally:
+             await session.close() 
```

```diff
- 
+ from sqlalchemy import Column, Integer, String, Text, Boolean, DateTime, ForeignKey, Table, Enum
+ from sqlalchemy.sql import func
+ from sqlalchemy.orm import relationship
+ from app.core.database import Base
+ import enum
+ 
+ # ê²Œì‹œê¸€ íƒ€ì… Enum
+ class PostType(str, enum.Enum):
+     DEV = "dev"
+     ESG = "esg"
+ 
+ # ê²Œì‹œê¸€-íƒœê·¸ ì¤‘ê°„ í…Œì´ë¸”
+ post_tags = Table(
+     'post_tags',
+     Base.metadata,
+     Column('post_id', Integer, ForeignKey('posts.id', ondelete='CASCADE'), primary_key=True),
+     Column('tag_id', Integer, ForeignKey('tags.id', ondelete='CASCADE'), primary_key=True)
+ )
+ 
+ class Post(Base):
+     __tablename__ = "posts"
+     
+     id = Column(Integer, primary_key=True, index=True)
+     title = Column(String(255), nullable=False)
+     content = Column(Text, nullable=False)
+     summary = Column(Text)
+     slug = Column(String(255), unique=True, nullable=False, index=True)
+     post_type = Column(Enum(PostType), nullable=False, index=True)
+     category_id = Column(Integer, ForeignKey("categories.id", ondelete="SET NULL"))
+     author_id = Column(Integer, ForeignKey("users.id", ondelete="CASCADE"))
+     is_published = Column(Boolean, default=False, index=True)
+     view_count = Column(Integer, default=0)
+     created_at = Column(DateTime(timezone=True), server_default=func.now(), index=True)
+     updated_at = Column(DateTime(timezone=True), server_default=func.now(), onupdate=func.now())
+     
+     # ê´€ê³„ ì„¤ì •
+     category = relationship("Category", back_populates="posts")
+     tags = relationship("Tag", secondary=post_tags, back_populates="posts")
+     comments = relationship("Comment", back_populates="post", cascade="all, delete-orphan") 
```

```diff
+ from pydantic import BaseModel
+ from typing import Optional, List
+ from datetime import datetime
+ from app.models.post import PostType
+ from app.schemas.category import CategoryResponse
+ from app.schemas.tag import TagResponse
+ 
+ # ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ê¸°ë³¸ ìŠ¤í‚¤ë§ˆ
+ class PostBase(BaseModel):
+     title: str
+     content: str
+     summary: Optional[str] = None
+     post_type: PostType
+     category_id: Optional[int] = None
+     is_published: bool = False
+ 
+ # ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ìƒì„± ìŠ¤í‚¤ë§ˆ
+ class PostCreate(PostBase):
+     tag_ids: Optional[List[int]] = []
+     
+     class Config:
+         json_schema_extra = {
+             "example": {
+                 "title": "FastAPIë¡œ ë§ˆì´í¬ë¡œì„œë¹„ìŠ¤ êµ¬ì¶•í•˜ê¸°",
+                 "content": "# FastAPI ë§ˆì´í¬ë¡œì„œë¹„ìŠ¤ ì•„í‚¤í…ì²˜\n\nFastAPIëŠ”...",
+                 "summary": "FastAPIë¥¼ ì‚¬ìš©í•œ ë§ˆì´í¬ë¡œì„œë¹„ìŠ¤ ì•„í‚¤í…ì²˜ êµ¬ì¶• ê°€ì´ë“œ",
+                 "post_type": "dev",
+                 "category_id": 2,
+                 "is_published": True,
+                 "tag_ids": [4, 5, 6]
+             }
+         }
+ 
+ # ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ìˆ˜ì • ìŠ¤í‚¤ë§ˆ
+ class PostUpdate(BaseModel):
+     title: Optional[str] = None
+     content: Optional[str] = None
+     summary: Optional[str] = None
+     post_type: Optional[PostType] = None
+     category_id: Optional[int] = None
+     is_published: Optional[bool] = None
+     tag_ids: Optional[List[int]] = None
+ 
+ # ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ëª©ë¡ìš© ê°„ë‹¨ ìŠ¤í‚¤ë§ˆ

+     summary: Optional[str]
+     slug: str
```

## ğŸ” **Step 3.4: JWT ê²€ì¦ ìœ í‹¸ë¦¬í‹°**

ë¨¼ì € Blog Serviceì—ì„œë„ JWT í† í°ì„ ê²€ì¦í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆë„ë¡ ë³´ì•ˆ ìœ í‹¸ë¦¬í‹°ë¥¼ ë§Œë“¤ê² ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.

---

```diff
- 
+  
```

---

```diff
-  
+ from typing import Optional
+ from jose import JWTError, jwt
+ from fastapi import HTTPException, status, Depends
+ from fastapi.security import HTTPBearer, HTTPAuthorizationCredentials
+ from app.core.config import settings
+ 
+ security = HTTPBearer()
+ 
+ def verify_token(token: str) -> dict:
+     """JWT í† í° ê²€ì¦"""
+     try:
+         payload = jwt.decode(
+             token, 
+             settings.JWT_SECRET_KEY, 
+             algorithms=[settings.JWT_ALGORITHM]
+         )
+         
+         user_id: int = payload.get("sub")
+         if user_id is None:
+             raise HTTPException(
+                 status_code=status.HTTP_401_UNAUTHORIZED,
+                 detail="í† í°ì—ì„œ ì‚¬ìš©ì ì •ë³´ë¥¼ ì°¾ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤",
+                 headers={"WWW-Authenticate": "Bearer"},
+             )
+         
+         return payload
+         
+     except JWTError:
+         raise HTTPException(
+             status_code=status.HTTP_401_UNAUTHORIZED,
+             detail="í† í° ê²€ì¦ì— ì‹¤íŒ¨í–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤",
+             headers={"WWW-Authenticate": "Bearer"},
+         )
+ 
+ def get_current_user_id(
+     credentials: HTTPAuthorizationCredentials = Depends(security)
+ ) -> int:
+     """í˜„ì¬ ì‚¬ìš©ì ID ì¶”ì¶œ"""
+     token = credentials.credentials
+     payload = verify_token(token)
+     return int(payload.get("sub"))
+ 
+ def decode_access_token(token: str) -> Optional[dict]:
+     """í† í° ë””ì½”ë“œ (ì—ëŸ¬ ì—†ì´)"""
+     try:
+         payload = jwt.decode(
+             token, 
+             settings.JWT_SECRET_KEY, 
+             algorithms=[settings.JWT_ALGORITHM]
+         )
+         return payload
+     except JWTError:
+         return None 
```

## ğŸ“ **Step 3.5: Posts API ë¼ìš°í„°**

ì´ì œ ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ê´€ë¦¬ë¥¼ ìœ„í•œ í•µì‹¬ APIë¥¼ êµ¬í˜„í•˜ê² ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.

---

```diff
- 
+ from fastapi import APIRouter, Depends, HTTPException, status, Query
+ from sqlalchemy.ext.asyncio import AsyncSession
+ from sqlalchemy import select, func, desc, asc, and_, or_
+ from sqlalchemy.orm import selectinload
+ from typing import Optional, List
+ from slugify import slugify
+ from app.core.database import get_db
+ from app.core.security import get_current_user_id
+ from app.models.post import Post, PostType
+ from app.models.category import Category
+ from app.models.tag import Tag
+ from app.schemas.post import (
+     PostCreate, PostUpdate, PostResponse, 
+     PostSummary, PostListResponse
+ )
+ import logging
+ 
+ logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)
+ router = APIRouter()
+ 
+ @router.get("/", response_model=PostListResponse)
+ async def get_posts(
+     page: int = Query(1, ge=1, description="í˜ì´ì§€ ë²ˆí˜¸"),
+     size: int = Query(10, ge=1, le=50, description="í˜ì´ì§€ í¬ê¸°"),
+     post_type: Optional[PostType] = Query(None, description="ê²Œì‹œê¸€ íƒ€ì… (dev/esg)"),
+     category_id: Optional[int] = Query(None, description="ì¹´í…Œê³ ë¦¬ ID"),
+     published_only: bool = Query(True, description="ë°œí–‰ëœ ê²Œì‹œê¸€ë§Œ"),
+     sort_by: str = Query("created_at", description="ì •ë ¬ ê¸°ì¤€"),
+     sort_order: str = Query("desc", description="ì •ë ¬ ìˆœì„œ"),
+     db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db)
+ ):
+     """ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ëª©ë¡ ì¡°íšŒ (í˜ì´ì§€ë„¤ì´ì…˜)"""
+     try:
+         # ê¸°ë³¸ ì¿¼ë¦¬
+         query = select(Post).options(
+             selectinload(Post.category),
+             selectinload(Post.tags)
+         )
+         
+         # í•„í„° ì¡°ê±´
+         filters = []
+         if published_only:
+             filters.append(Post.is_published == True)
+         if post_type:
+             filters.append(Post.post_type == post_type)
+         if category_id:
+             filters.append(Post.category_id == category_id)
+             
+         if filters:
+             query = query.where(and_(*filters))
+         
+         # ì •ë ¬
+         sort_column = getattr(Post, sort_by, Post.created_at)
+         if sort_order == "asc":
+             query = query.order_by(asc(sort_column))
+         else:
+             query = query.order_by(desc(sort_column))
+         
+         # ì „ì²´ ê°œìˆ˜ ê³„ì‚°
+         count_query = select(func.count(Post.id))
+         if filters:
+             count_query = count_query.where(and_(*filters))
+         total_result = await db.execute(count_query)
+         total = total_result.scalar()
+         
+         # í˜ì´ì§€ë„¤ì´ì…˜
+         offset = (page - 1) * size
+         query = query.offset(offset).limit(size)
+         
+         result = await db.execute(query)
+         posts = result.scalars().all()
+         
+         return PostListResponse(
+             posts=[PostSummary.model_validate(post) for post in posts],
+             total=total,
+             page=page,
+             size=size,
+             total_pages=(total + size - 1) // size
+         )
+         
+     except Exception as e:
+         logger.error(f"ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ëª©ë¡ ì¡°íšŒ ì‹¤íŒ¨: {e}")
+         raise HTTPException(
+             status_code=status.HTTP_500_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR,
+             detail="ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ëª©ë¡ ì¡°íšŒì— ì‹¤íŒ¨í–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤"
+         )
+ 
+ @router.get("/search", response_model=PostListResponse)
+ async def search_posts(
+     q: str = Query(..., description="ê²€ìƒ‰ì–´"),
+     page: int = Query(1, ge=1),
+     size: int = Query(10, ge=1, le=50),
+     post_type: Optional[PostType] = Query(None),
+     db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db)
+ ):
+     """ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ê²€ìƒ‰"""
+     try:
+         # ê²€ìƒ‰ ì¿¼ë¦¬
+         search_term = f"%{q}%"
+         query = select(Post).options(
+             selectinload(Post.category),
+             selectinload(Post.tags)
+         ).where(
+             and_(
+                 Post.is_published == True,
+                 or_(
+                     Post.title.ilike(search_term),
+                     Post.content.ilike(search_term),
+                     Post.summary.ilike(search_term)
+                 )
+             )
+         )
+         
+         if post_type:
+             query = query.where(Post.post_type == post_type)
+             
+         # ê´€ë ¨ë„ìˆœ ì •ë ¬ (ì œëª© ìš°ì„ )
+         query = query.order_by(desc(Post.created_at))
+         
+         # ì „ì²´ ê°œìˆ˜
+         count_query = select(func.count(Post.id)).where(
+             and_(
+                 Post.is_published == True,
+                 or_(
+                     Post.title.ilike(search_term),
+                     Post.content.ilike(search_term),
+                     Post.summary.ilike(search_term)
+                 )
+             )
+         )
+         if post_type:
+             count_query = count_query.where(Post.post_type == post_type)
+             
+         total_result = await db.execute(count_query)
+         total = total_result.scalar()
+         
+         # í˜ì´ì§€ë„¤ì´ì…˜
+         offset = (page - 1) * size
+         query = query.offset(offset).limit(size)
+         
+         result = await db.execute(query)
+         posts = result.scalars().all()
+         
+         return PostListResponse(
+             posts=[PostSummary.model_validate(post) for post in posts],
+             total=total,
+             page=page,
+             size=size,
+             total_pages=(total + size - 1) // size
+         )
+         
+     except Exception as e:
+         logger.error(f"ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ê²€ìƒ‰ ì‹¤íŒ¨: {e}")
+         raise HTTPException(
+             status_code=status.HTTP_500_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR,
+             detail="ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ê²€ìƒ‰ì— ì‹¤íŒ¨í–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤"
+         )
+ 
+ @router.get("/{post_id}", response_model=PostResponse)
+ async def get_post(
+     post_id: int,
+     db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db)
+ ):
+     """ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ìƒì„¸ ì¡°íšŒ"""
+     try:
+         # ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ì¡°íšŒ
+         query = select(Post).options(
+             selectinload(Post.category),
+             selectinload(Post.tags),
+             selectinload(Post.comments)
+         ).where(Post.id == post_id)
+         
+         result = await db.execute(query)
+         post = result.scalar_one_or_none()
+         
+         if not post:
+             raise HTTPException(
+                 status_code=status.HTTP_404_NOT_FOUND,
+                 detail="ê²Œì‹œê¸€ì„ ì°¾ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤"
+             )
+         
+         # ì¡°íšŒìˆ˜ ì¦ê°€
+         post.view_count += 1
+         await db.commit()
+         
+         return PostResponse.model_validate(post)
+         
+     except HTTPException:
+         raise
+     except Exception as e:
+         logger.error(f"ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ì¡°íšŒ ì‹¤íŒ¨: {e}")
+         raise HTTPException(
+             status_code=status.HTTP_500_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR,
+             detail="ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ì¡°íšŒì— ì‹¤íŒ¨í–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤"
+         )
+ 
+ @router.get("/slug/{slug}", response_model=PostResponse)
+ async def get_post_by_slug(
+     slug: str,
+     db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db)
+ ):
+     """ìŠ¬ëŸ¬ê·¸ë¡œ ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ì¡°íšŒ"""
+     try:
+         query = select(Post).options(
+             selectinload(Post.category),
+             selectinload(Post.tags),
+             selectinload(Post.comments)
+         ).where(Post.slug == slug)
+         
+         result = await db.execute(query)
+         post = result.scalar_one_or_none()
+         
+         if not post:
+             raise HTTPException(
+                 status_code=status.HTTP_404_NOT_FOUND,
+                 detail="ê²Œì‹œê¸€ì„ ì°¾ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤"
+             )
+         
+         # ì¡°íšŒìˆ˜ ì¦ê°€
+         post.view_count += 1
+         await db.commit()
+         
+         return PostResponse.model_validate(post)
+         
+     except HTTPException:
+         raise
+     except Exception as e:
+         logger.error(f"ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ì¡°íšŒ ì‹¤íŒ¨: {e}")
+         raise HTTPException(
+             status_code=status.HTTP_500_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR,
+             detail="ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ì¡°íšŒì— ì‹¤íŒ¨í–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤"
+         )
+ 
+ @router.post("/", response_model=PostResponse, status_code=status.HTTP_201_CREATED)
+ async def create_post(
+     post_data: PostCreate,
+     current_user_id: int = Depends(get_current_user_id),
+     db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db)
+ ):
+     """ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ìƒì„± (ë¡œê·¸ì¸ í•„ìš”)"""
+     try:
+         # ìŠ¬ëŸ¬ê·¸ ìƒì„±
+         base_slug = slugify(post_data.title)
+         slug = base_slug
+         counter = 1
+         
+         # ìŠ¬ëŸ¬ê·¸ ì¤‘ë³µ ì²´í¬
+         while True:
+             existing = await db.execute(
+                 select(Post).where(Post.slug == slug)
+             )
+             if not existing.scalar_one_or_none():
+                 break
+             slug = f"{base_slug}-{counter}"
+             counter += 1
+         
+         # ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ìƒì„±
+         post = Post(
+             title=post_data.title,
+             content=post_data.content,
+             summary=post_data.summary,
+             slug=slug,
+             post_type=post_data.post_type,
+             category_id=post_data.category_id,
+             author_id=current_user_id,
+             is_published=post_data.is_published
+         )
+         
+         db.add(post)
+         await db.flush()  # ID ìƒì„±ì„ ìœ„í•´
+         
+         # íƒœê·¸ ì—°ê²°
+         if post_data.tag_ids:
+             tag_query = select(Tag).where(Tag.id.in_(post_data.tag_ids))
+             tag_result = await db.execute(tag_query)
+             tags = tag_result.scalars().all()
+             post.tags.extend(tags)
+         
+         await db.commit()
+         await db.refresh(post)
+         
+         # ê´€ê³„ ë°ì´í„° ë¡œë“œ
+         await db.refresh(post, ["category", "tags"])
+         
+         logger.info(f"ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ìƒì„±ë¨: {post.id} - {post.title}")
+         return PostResponse.model_validate(post)
+         
+     except Exception as e:
+         await db.rollback()
+         logger.error(f"ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ìƒì„± ì‹¤íŒ¨: {e}")
+         raise HTTPException(
+             status_code=status.HTTP_500_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR,
+             detail="ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ìƒì„±ì— ì‹¤íŒ¨í–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤"
+         )
+ 
+ @router.put("/{post_id}", response_model=PostResponse)
+ async def update_post(
+     post_id: int,
+     post_data: PostUpdate,
+     current_user_id: int = Depends(get_current_user_id),
+     db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db)
+ ):
+     """ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ìˆ˜ì •"""
+     try:
+         # ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ì¡°íšŒ
+         query = select(Post).options(
+             selectinload(Post.category),
+             selectinload(Post.tags)
+         ).where(Post.id == post_id)
+         
+         result = await db.execute(query)
+         post = result.scalar_one_or_none()
+         
+         if not post:
+             raise HTTPException(
+                 status_code=status.HTTP_404_NOT_FOUND,
+                 detail="ê²Œì‹œê¸€ì„ ì°¾ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤"
+             )
+         
+         # ìˆ˜ì • ê¶Œí•œ ì²´í¬ (ì‘ì„±ìë§Œ)
+         if post.author_id != current_user_id:
+             raise HTTPException(
+                 status_code=status.HTTP_403_FORBIDDEN,
+                 detail="ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ìˆ˜ì • ê¶Œí•œì´ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤"
+             )
+         
+         # í•„ë“œ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
+         update_data = post_data.model_dump(exclude_unset=True)
+         
+         if "tag_ids" in update_data:
+             tag_ids = update_data.pop("tag_ids")
+             # ê¸°ì¡´ íƒœê·¸ ì œê±°
+             post.tags.clear()
+             # ìƒˆ íƒœê·¸ ì¶”ê°€
+             if tag_ids:
+                 tag_query = select(Tag).where(Tag.id.in_(tag_ids))
+                 tag_result = await db.execute(tag_query)
+                 tags = tag_result.scalars().all()
+                 post.tags.extend(tags)
+         
+         # ì œëª©ì´ ë³€ê²½ë˜ë©´ ìŠ¬ëŸ¬ê·¸ë„ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
+         if "title" in update_data:
+             base_slug = slugify(update_data["title"])
+             slug = base_slug
+             counter = 1
+             
+             while True:
+                 existing = await db.execute(
+                     select(Post).where(
+                         and_(Post.slug == slug, Post.id != post_id)
+                     )
+                 )
+                 if not existing.scalar_one_or_none():
+                     break
+                 slug = f"{base_slug}-{counter}"
+                 counter += 1
+             
+             post.slug = slug
+         
+         # ë‚˜ë¨¸ì§€ í•„ë“œ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
+         for field, value in update_data.items():
+             setattr(post, field, value)
+         
+         await db.commit()
+         await db.refresh(post, ["category", "tags"])
+         
+         logger.info(f"ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ìˆ˜ì •ë¨: {post.id} - {post.title}")
+         return PostResponse.model_validate(post)
+         
+     except HTTPException:
+         raise
+     except Exception as e:
+         await db.rollback()
+         logger.error(f"ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ìˆ˜ì • ì‹¤íŒ¨: {e}")
+         raise HTTPException(
+             status_code=status.HTTP_500_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR,
+             detail="ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ìˆ˜ì •ì— ì‹¤íŒ¨í–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤"
+         )
+ 
+ @router.delete("/{post_id}", status_code=status.HTTP_204_NO_CONTENT)
+ async def delete_post(
+     post_id: int,
+     current_user_id: int = Depends(get_current_user_id),
+     db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db)
+ ):
+     """ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ì‚­ì œ"""
+     try:
+         # ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ì¡°íšŒ
+         query = select(Post).where(Post.id == post_id)
+         result = await db.execute(query)
+         post = result.scalar_one_or_none()
+         
+         if not post:
+             raise HTTPException(
+                 status_code=status.HTTP_404_NOT_FOUND,
+                 detail="ê²Œì‹œê¸€ì„ ì°¾ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤"
+             )
+         
+         # ì‚­ì œ ê¶Œí•œ ì²´í¬ (ì‘ì„±ìë§Œ)
+         if post.author_id != current_user_id:
+             raise HTTPException(
+                 status_code=status.HTTP_403_FORBIDDEN,
+                 detail="ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ì‚­ì œ ê¶Œí•œì´ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤"
+             )
+         
+         await db.delete(post)
+         await db.commit()
+         
+         logger.info(f"ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ì‚­ì œë¨: {post_id}")
+         
+     except HTTPException:
+         raise
+     except Exception as e:
+         await db.rollback()
+         logger.error(f"ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ì‚­ì œ ì‹¤íŒ¨: {e}")
+         raise HTTPException(
+             status_code=status.HTTP_500_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR,
+             detail="ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ì‚­ì œì— ì‹¤íŒ¨í–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤"
+         )
+ 
+ @router.patch("/{post_id}/publish", response_model=PostResponse)
+ async def toggle_publish(
+     post_id: int,
+     current_user_id: int = Depends(get_current_user_id),
+     db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db)
+ ):
+     """ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ë°œí–‰/ë¹„ë°œí–‰ í† ê¸€"""
+     try:
+         query = select(Post).where(Post.id == post_id)
+         result = await db.execute(query)
+         post = result.scalar_one_or_none()
+         
+         if not post:
+             raise HTTPException(
+                 status_code=status.HTTP_404_NOT_FOUND,
+                 detail="ê²Œì‹œê¸€ì„ ì°¾ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤"
+             )
+         
+         # ê¶Œí•œ ì²´í¬
+         if post.author_id != current_user_id:
+             raise HTTPException(
+                 status_code=status.HTTP_403_FORBIDDEN,
+                 detail="ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ë°œí–‰ ê¶Œí•œì´ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤"
+             )
+         
+         # ë°œí–‰ ìƒíƒœ í† ê¸€
+         post.is_published = not post.is_published
+         await db.commit()
+         await db.refresh(post, ["category", "tags"])
+         
+         status_text = "ë°œí–‰" if post.is_published else "ë¹„ë°œí–‰"
+         logger.info(f"ê²Œì‹œê¸€ {status_text}ë¨: {post.id}")
+         
+         return PostResponse.model_validate(post)
+         
+     except HTTPException:
+         raise
+     except Exception as e:
+         await db.rollback()
+         logger.error(f"ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ë°œí–‰ ìƒíƒœ ë³€ê²½ ì‹¤íŒ¨: {e}")
+         raise HTTPException(
+             status_code=status.HTTP_500_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR,
+             detail="ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ë°œí–‰ ìƒíƒœ ë³€ê²½ì— ì‹¤íŒ¨í–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤"
+         ) 
```

```diff
+ async def create_category(
+     category_data: CategoryCreate,
+     current_user_id: int = Depends(get_current_user_id),
+     db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db)

+         # ìŠ¬ëŸ¬ê·¸ ê²€ì¦ ë˜ëŠ” ìë™ ìƒì„±

+             slug = category_data.slug
+         
+         # ìŠ¬ëŸ¬ê·¸ ì¤‘ë³µ ì²´í¬

+             select(Category).where(Category.slug == slug)

+             raise HTTPException(
+                 status_code=status.HTTP_409_CONFLICT,
+                 detail="ì´ë¯¸ ì¡´ì¬í•˜ëŠ” ìŠ¬ëŸ¬ê·¸ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤"

+         
+         # ì¹´í…Œê³ ë¦¬ ì´ë¦„ ì¤‘ë³µ ì²´í¬
+         existing_name = await db.execute(
+             select(Category).where(Category.name == category_data.name)

+             raise HTTPException(
+                 status_code=status.HTTP_409_CONFLICT,

+ @router.delete("/{category_id}", status_code=status.HTTP_204_NO_CONTENT)
+ async def delete_category(
+     category_id: int,
+     current_user_id: int = Depends(get_current_user_id),
+     db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db)

+     """ì¹´í…Œê³ ë¦¬ ì‚­ì œ (ë¡œê·¸ì¸ í•„ìš”)"""
+     try:
+         # ì¹´í…Œê³ ë¦¬ ì¡°íšŒ
+         query = select(Category).where(Category.id == category_id)
+         result = await db.execute(query)
+         category = result.scalar_one_or_none()
+         
+         if not category:
+             raise HTTPException(
+                 status_code=status.HTTP_404_NOT_FOUND,
+                 detail="ì¹´í…Œê³ ë¦¬ë¥¼ ì°¾ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤"
+             )
+         
+         # í•´ë‹¹ ì¹´í…Œê³ ë¦¬ë¥¼ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ëŠ” ê²Œì‹œê¸€ì´ ìˆëŠ”ì§€ í™•ì¸
+         posts_query = select(func.count(Post.id)).where(Post.category_id == category_id)
+         posts_result = await db.execute(posts_query)
+         posts_count = posts_result.scalar()
+         
+         if posts_count > 0:
+             raise HTTPException(
+                 status_code=status.HTTP_409_CONFLICT,
+                 detail=f"í•´ë‹¹ ì¹´í…Œê³ ë¦¬ë¥¼ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ëŠ” ê²Œì‹œê¸€ì´ {posts_count}ê°œ ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. ê²Œì‹œê¸€ì„ ë¨¼ì € ì‚­ì œí•˜ê±°ë‚˜ ë‹¤ë¥¸ ì¹´í…Œê³ ë¦¬ë¡œ ì´ë™í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”."
+             )
+         
+         await db.delete(category)
+         await db.commit()
+         
+         logger.info(f"ì¹´í…Œê³ ë¦¬ ì‚­ì œë¨: {category_id} - {category.name}")
+         
+     except HTTPException:
+         raise
+     except Exception as e:
+         await db.rollback()
+         logger.error(f"ì¹´í…Œê³ ë¦¬ ì‚­ì œ ì‹¤íŒ¨: {e}")
+         raise HTTPException(
+             status_code=status.HTTP_500_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR,
+             detail="ì¹´í…Œê³ ë¦¬ ì‚­ì œì— ì‹¤íŒ¨í–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤"
+         )
+ 
+ @router.get("/{category_id}/posts")
+ async def get_category_posts(
+     category_id: int,
+     db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db)
+ ):
+     """íŠ¹ì • ì¹´í…Œê³ ë¦¬ì˜ ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ìˆ˜ ì¡°íšŒ"""
+     try:
+         # ì¹´í…Œê³ ë¦¬ ì¡´ì¬ í™•ì¸
+         category_query = select(Category).where(Category.id == category_id)
+         category_result = await db.execute(category_query)
+         category = category_result.scalar_one_or_none()
+         
+         if not category:
+             raise HTTPException(
+                 status_code=status.HTTP_404_NOT_FOUND,
+                 detail="ì¹´í…Œê³ ë¦¬ë¥¼ ì°¾ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤"
+             )
+         
+         # ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ìˆ˜ ê³„ì‚°
+         total_query = select(func.count(Post.id)).where(Post.category_id == category_id)
+         published_query = select(func.count(Post.id)).where(
+             Post.category_id == category_id,
+             Post.is_published == True
+         )
+         
+         total_result = await db.execute(total_query)
+         published_result = await db.execute(published_query)
+         
+         total_posts = total_result.scalar()
+         published_posts = published_result.scalar()
+         
+         return {
+             "category": CategoryResponse.model_validate(category),
+             "total_posts": total_posts,
+             "published_posts": published_posts
+         }
+         
+     except HTTPException:
+         raise
+     except Exception as e:
+         logger.error(f"ì¹´í…Œê³ ë¦¬ ê²Œì‹œê¸€ í†µê³„ ì¡°íšŒ ì‹¤íŒ¨: {e}")
+         raise HTTPException(
+             status_code=status.HTTP_500_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR,
+             detail="ì¹´í…Œê³ ë¦¬ ê²Œì‹œê¸€ í†µê³„ ì¡°íšŒì— ì‹¤íŒ¨í–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤"
+         ) 
```

## ğŸ·ï¸ **Step 3.9: Tags API ë¼ìš°í„° ì¶”ê°€**

íƒœê·¸ ê´€ë¦¬ë¥¼ ìœ„í•œ APIë„ ë§Œë“¤ì–´ë³´ê² ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.

```diff
- 
+ from fastapi import APIRouter, Depends, HTTPException, status
+ from sqlalchemy.ext.asyncio import AsyncSession
+ from sqlalchemy import select, func, desc
+ from sqlalchemy.orm import selectinload
+ from typing import List
+ from slugify import slugify
+ from app.core.database import get_db
+ from app.core.security import get_current_user_id
+ from app.models.tag import Tag
+ from app.models.post import Post, post_tags
+ from app.schemas.tag import TagCreate, TagResponse
+ import logging
+ 
+ logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)
+ router = APIRouter()
+ 
+ @router.get("/", response_model=List[TagResponse])
+ async def get_tags(
+     db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db)
+ ):
+     """íƒœê·¸ ëª©ë¡ ì¡°íšŒ"""
+     try:
+         query = select(Tag).order_by(Tag.name)
+         result = await db.execute(query)
+         tags = result.scalars().all()
+         
+         return [TagResponse.model_validate(tag) for tag in tags]
+         
+     except Exception as e:
+         logger.error(f"íƒœê·¸ ëª©ë¡ ì¡°íšŒ ì‹¤íŒ¨: {e}")
+         raise HTTPException(
+             status_code=status.HTTP_500_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR,
+             detail="íƒœê·¸ ëª©ë¡ ì¡°íšŒì— ì‹¤íŒ¨í–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤"
+         )
+ 
+ @router.get("/popular", response_model=List[dict])
+ async def get_popular_tags(
+     limit: int = 10,
+     db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db)
+ ):
+     """ì¸ê¸° íƒœê·¸ ëª©ë¡ (ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ìˆ˜ ê¸°ì¤€)"""
+     try:
+         # íƒœê·¸ë³„ ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ìˆ˜ ê³„ì‚°
+         query = select(
+             Tag,
+             func.count(post_tags.c.post_id).label('post_count')
+         ).outerjoin(
+             post_tags
+         ).group_by(
+             Tag.id
+         ).order_by(
+             desc('post_count')
+         ).limit(limit)
+         
+         result = await db.execute(query)
+         tag_stats = result.all()
+         
+         return [
+             {
+                 "tag": TagResponse.model_validate(tag),
+                 "post_count": count
+             }
+             for tag, count in tag_stats
+         ]
+         
+     except Exception as e:
+         logger.error(f"ì¸ê¸° íƒœê·¸ ì¡°íšŒ ì‹¤íŒ¨: {e}")
+         raise HTTPException(
+             status_code=status.HTTP_500_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR,
+             detail="ì¸ê¸° íƒœê·¸ ì¡°íšŒì— ì‹¤íŒ¨í–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤"
+         )
+ 
+ @router.get("/{tag_id}", response_model=TagResponse)
+ async def get_tag(
+     tag_id: int,
+     db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db)
+ ):
+     """íƒœê·¸ ìƒì„¸ ì¡°íšŒ"""
+     try:
+         query = select(Tag).where(Tag.id == tag_id)
+         result = await db.execute(query)
+         tag = result.scalar_one_or_none()
+         
+         if not tag:
+             raise HTTPException(
+                 status_code=status.HTTP_404_NOT_FOUND,
+                 detail="íƒœê·¸ë¥¼ ì°¾ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤"
+             )
+         
+         return TagResponse.model_validate(tag)
+         
+     except HTTPException:
+         raise
+     except Exception as e:
+         logger.error(f"íƒœê·¸ ì¡°íšŒ ì‹¤íŒ¨: {e}")
+         raise HTTPException(
+             status_code=status.HTTP_500_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR,
+             detail="íƒœê·¸ ì¡°íšŒì— ì‹¤íŒ¨í–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤"
+         )
+ 
+ @router.get("/slug/{slug}", response_model=TagResponse)
+ async def get_tag_by_slug(
+     slug: str,
+     db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db)
+ ):
+     """ìŠ¬ëŸ¬ê·¸ë¡œ íƒœê·¸ ì¡°íšŒ"""
+     try:
+         query = select(Tag).where(Tag.slug == slug)
+         result = await db.execute(query)
+         tag = result.scalar_one_or_none()
+         
+         if not tag:
+             raise HTTPException(
+                 status_code=status.HTTP_404_NOT_FOUND,
+                 detail="íƒœê·¸ë¥¼ ì°¾ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤"
+             )
+         
+         return TagResponse.model_validate(tag)
+         
+     except HTTPException:
+         raise
+     except Exception as e:
+         logger.error(f"íƒœê·¸ ì¡°íšŒ ì‹¤íŒ¨: {e}")
+         raise HTTPException(
+             status_code=status.HTTP_500_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR,
+             detail="íƒœê·¸ ì¡°íšŒì— ì‹¤íŒ¨í–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤"
+         )
+ 
+ @router.post("/", response_model=TagResponse, status_code=status.HTTP_201_CREATED)
+ async def create_tag(
+     tag_data: TagCreate,
+     current_user_id: int = Depends(get_current_user_id),
+     db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db)
+ ):
+     """íƒœê·¸ ìƒì„± (ë¡œê·¸ì¸ í•„ìš”)"""
+     try:
+         # ìŠ¬ëŸ¬ê·¸ ê²€ì¦ ë˜ëŠ” ìë™ ìƒì„±
+         if not tag_data.slug:
+             slug = slugify(tag_data.name)
+         else:
+             slug = tag_data.slug
+         
+         # ìŠ¬ëŸ¬ê·¸ ì¤‘ë³µ ì²´í¬
+         existing = await db.execute(
+             select(Tag).where(Tag.slug == slug)
+         )
+         if existing.scalar_one_or_none():
+             raise HTTPException(
+                 status_code=status.HTTP_409_CONFLICT,
+                 detail="ì´ë¯¸ ì¡´ì¬í•˜ëŠ” ìŠ¬ëŸ¬ê·¸ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤"
+             )
+         
+         # íƒœê·¸ ì´ë¦„ ì¤‘ë³µ ì²´í¬
+         existing_name = await db.execute(
+             select(Tag).where(Tag.name == tag_data.name)
+         )
+         if existing_name.scalar_one_or_none():
+             raise HTTPException(
+                 status_code=status.HTTP_409_CONFLICT,
+                 detail="ì´ë¯¸ ì¡´ì¬í•˜ëŠ” íƒœê·¸ëª…ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤"
+             )
+         
+         # íƒœê·¸ ìƒì„±
+         tag = Tag(
+             name=tag_data.name,
+             slug=slug
+         )
+         
+         db.add(tag)
+         await db.commit()
+         await db.refresh(tag)
+         
+         logger.info(f"íƒœê·¸ ìƒì„±ë¨: {tag.id} - {tag.name}")
+         return TagResponse.model_validate(tag)
+         
+     except HTTPException:
+         raise
+     except Exception as e:
+         await db.rollback()
+         logger.error(f"íƒœê·¸ ìƒì„± ì‹¤íŒ¨: {e}")
+         raise HTTPException(
+             status_code=status.HTTP_500_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR,
+             detail="íƒœê·¸ ìƒì„±ì— ì‹¤íŒ¨í–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤"
+         )
+ 
+ @router.put("/{tag_id}", response_model=TagResponse)
+ async def update_tag(
+     tag_id: int,
+     tag_data: TagCreate,
+     current_user_id: int = Depends(get_current_user_id),
+     db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db)
+ ):
+     """íƒœê·¸ ìˆ˜ì • (ë¡œê·¸ì¸ í•„ìš”)"""
+     try:
+         # íƒœê·¸ ì¡°íšŒ
+         query = select(Tag).where(Tag.id == tag_id)
+         result = await db.execute(query)
+         tag = result.scalar_one_or_none()
+         
+         if not tag:
+             raise HTTPException(
+                 status_code=status.HTTP_404_NOT_FOUND,
+                 detail="íƒœê·¸ë¥¼ ì°¾ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤"
+             )
+         
+         # ìŠ¬ëŸ¬ê·¸ ì²˜ë¦¬
+         if not tag_data.slug:
+             slug = slugify(tag_data.name)
+         else:
+             slug = tag_data.slug
+         
+         # ìŠ¬ëŸ¬ê·¸ ì¤‘ë³µ ì²´í¬ (ìì‹  ì œì™¸)
+         existing = await db.execute(
+             select(Tag).where(
+                 Tag.slug == slug,
+                 Tag.id != tag_id
+             )
+         )
+         if existing.scalar_one_or_none():
+             raise HTTPException(
+                 status_code=status.HTTP_409_CONFLICT,
+                 detail="ì´ë¯¸ ì¡´ì¬í•˜ëŠ” ìŠ¬ëŸ¬ê·¸ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤"
+             )
+         
+         # íƒœê·¸ ì´ë¦„ ì¤‘ë³µ ì²´í¬ (ìì‹  ì œì™¸)
+         existing_name = await db.execute(
+             select(Tag).where(
+                 Tag.name == tag_data.name,
+                 Tag.id != tag_id
+             )
+         )
+         if existing_name.scalar_one_or_none():
+             raise HTTPException(
+                 status_code=status.HTTP_409_CONFLICT,
+                 detail="ì´ë¯¸ ì¡´ì¬í•˜ëŠ” íƒœê·¸ëª…ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤"
+             )
+         
+         # íƒœê·¸ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
+         tag.name = tag_data.name
+         tag.slug = slug
+         
+         await db.commit()
+         await db.refresh(tag)
+         
+         logger.info(f"íƒœê·¸ ìˆ˜ì •ë¨: {tag.id} - {tag.name}")
+         return TagResponse.model_validate(tag)
+         
+     except HTTPException:
+         raise
+     except Exception as e:
+         await db.rollback()
+         logger.error(f"íƒœê·¸ ìˆ˜ì • ì‹¤íŒ¨: {e}")
+         raise HTTPException(
+             status_code=status.HTTP_500_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR,
+             detail="íƒœê·¸ ìˆ˜ì •ì— ì‹¤íŒ¨í–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤"
+         )
+ 
+ @router.delete("/{tag_id}", status_code=status.HTTP_204_NO_CONTENT)
+ async def delete_tag(
+     tag_id: int,
+     current_user_id: int = Depends(get_current_user_id),
+     db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db)
+ ):
+     """íƒœê·¸ ì‚­ì œ (ë¡œê·¸ì¸ í•„ìš”)"""
+     try:
+         # íƒœê·¸ ì¡°íšŒ
+         query = select(Tag).where(Tag.id == tag_id)
+         result = await db.execute(query)
+         tag = result.scalar_one_or_none()
+         
+         if not tag:
+             raise HTTPException(
+                 status_code=status.HTTP_404_NOT_FOUND,
+                 detail="íƒœê·¸ë¥¼ ì°¾ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤"
+             )
+         
+         # í•´ë‹¹ íƒœê·¸ë¥¼ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ëŠ” ê²Œì‹œê¸€ì´ ìˆëŠ”ì§€ í™•ì¸
+         posts_query = select(func.count(post_tags.c.post_id)).where(
+             post_tags.c.tag_id == tag_id
+         )
+         posts_result = await db.execute(posts_query)
+         posts_count = posts_result.scalar()
+         
+         if posts_count > 0:
+             # ê°•ì œ ì‚­ì œ ì˜µì…˜ì´ ì—†ìœ¼ë©´ ê²½ê³ 
+             raise HTTPException(
+                 status_code=status.HTTP_409_CONFLICT,
+                 detail=f"í•´ë‹¹ íƒœê·¸ë¥¼ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ëŠ” ê²Œì‹œê¸€ì´ {posts_count}ê°œ ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. ê²Œì‹œê¸€ì—ì„œ íƒœê·¸ë¥¼ ë¨¼ì € ì œê±°í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”."
+             )
+         
+         await db.delete(tag)
+         await db.commit()
+         
+         logger.info(f"íƒœê·¸ ì‚­ì œë¨: {tag_id} - {tag.name}")
+         
+     except HTTPException:
+         raise
+     except Exception as e:
+         await db.rollback()
+         logger.error(f"íƒœê·¸ ì‚­ì œ ì‹¤íŒ¨: {e}")
+         raise HTTPException(
+             status_code=status.HTTP_500_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR,
+             detail="íƒœê·¸ ì‚­ì œì— ì‹¤íŒ¨í–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤"
+         )
+ 
+ @router.get("/{tag_id}/posts")
+ async def get_tag_posts(
+     tag_id: int,
+     db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db)
+ ):
+     """íŠ¹ì • íƒœê·¸ì˜ ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ìˆ˜ ì¡°íšŒ"""
+     try:
+         # íƒœê·¸ ì¡´ì¬ í™•ì¸
+         tag_query = select(Tag).where(Tag.id == tag_id)
+         tag_result = await db.execute(tag_query)
+         tag = tag_result.scalar_one_or_none()
+         
+         if not tag:
+             raise HTTPException(
+                 status_code=status.HTTP_404_NOT_FOUND,
+                 detail="íƒœê·¸ë¥¼ ì°¾ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤"
+             )
+         
+         # ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ìˆ˜ ê³„ì‚°
+         total_query = select(func.count(post_tags.c.post_id)).where(
+             post_tags.c.tag_id == tag_id
+         )
+         
+         published_query = select(func.count(post_tags.c.post_id)).select_from(
+             post_tags.join(Post, post_tags.c.post_id == Post.id)
+         ).where(
+             post_tags.c.tag_id == tag_id,
+             Post.is_published == True
+         )
+         
+         total_result = await db.execute(total_query)
+         published_result = await db.execute(published_query)
+         
+         total_posts = total_result.scalar()
+         published_posts = published_result.scalar()
+         
+         return {
+             "tag": TagResponse.model_validate(tag),
+             "total_posts": total_posts,
+             "published_posts": published_posts
+         }
+         
+     except HTTPException:
+         raise
+     except Exception as e:
+         logger.error(f"íƒœê·¸ ê²Œì‹œê¸€ í†µê³„ ì¡°íšŒ ì‹¤íŒ¨: {e}")
+         raise HTTPException(
+             status_code=status.HTTP_500_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR,
+             detail="íƒœê·¸ ê²Œì‹œê¸€ í†µê³„ ì¡°íšŒì— ì‹¤íŒ¨í–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤"
+         ) 
```

## ğŸ§ª **Step 6: ì‹¤ì œ API ê¸°ëŠ¥ í…ŒìŠ¤íŠ¸**

### **6.1 Auth Service - ì‚¬ìš©ì ë“±ë¡ í…ŒìŠ¤íŠ¸**

---

## ğŸ”§ **Step 2: API í´ë¼ì´ì–¸íŠ¸ ì„¤ì •**

API í´ë¼ì´ì–¸íŠ¸ì™€ í™˜ê²½ë³€ìˆ˜ ì„¤ì •ì„ êµ¬í˜„í•˜ê² ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.

---

```diff
- 
+ import axios from 'axios';
+ import Cookies from 'js-cookie';
+ 
+ // API ê¸°ë³¸ URL (í™˜ê²½ë³€ìˆ˜ì—ì„œ ê°€ì ¸ì˜¤ê¸°)
+ const API_BASE_URL = process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL || 'http://localhost:8080';
+ 
+ // Axios ì¸ìŠ¤í„´ìŠ¤ ìƒì„±
+ export const apiClient = axios.create({
+   baseURL: API_BASE_URL,
+   timeout: 10000,
+   headers: {
+     'Content-Type': 'application/json',
+   },
+ });
+ 
+ // ìš”ì²­ ì¸í„°ì…‰í„°: JWT í† í° ìë™ ì¶”ê°€
+ apiClient.interceptors.request.use(
+   (config) => {
+     const token = Cookies.get('access_token');
+     if (token) {
+       config.headers.Authorization = `Bearer ${token}`;
+     }
+     return config;
+   },
+   (error) => {
+     return Promise.reject(error);
+   }
+ );
+ 
+ // ì‘ë‹µ ì¸í„°ì…‰í„°: ì—ëŸ¬ ì²˜ë¦¬
+ apiClient.interceptors.response.use(
+   (response) => {
+     return response;
+   },
+   (error) => {
+     // 401 Unauthorized: í† í° ë§Œë£Œ ë˜ëŠ” ìœ íš¨í•˜ì§€ ì•ŠìŒ
+     if (error.response?.status === 401) {
+       Cookies.remove('access_token');
+       // í•„ìš”ì‹œ ë¡œê·¸ì¸ í˜ì´ì§€ë¡œ ë¦¬ë‹¤ì´ë ‰íŠ¸
+       if (typeof window !== 'undefined') {
+         window.location.href = '/login';
+       }
+     }
+     
+     return Promise.reject(error);
+   }
+ );
+ 
+ // API ì—”ë“œí¬ì¸íŠ¸ ìƒìˆ˜
+ export const API_ENDPOINTS = {
+   // í—¬ìŠ¤ì²´í¬
+   HEALTH: '/health',
+   STATUS: '/status',
+   
+   // ì¸ì¦ ê´€ë ¨
+   AUTH_REGISTER: '/auth/auth/register',
+   AUTH_LOGIN: '/auth/auth/login',
+   AUTH_ME: '/auth/auth/me',
+   
+   // ë¸”ë¡œê·¸ ê´€ë ¨
+   BLOG_POSTS: '/blog/posts',
+   BLOG_CATEGORIES: '/blog/categories',
+   BLOG_TAGS: '/blog/tags',
+   BLOG_COMMENTS: '/blog/comments',
+ } as const;
+ 
+ export default apiClient; 
```

## ğŸ”— **Step 3: ë¸”ë¡œê·¸ API ì„œë¹„ìŠ¤ í•¨ìˆ˜**

ë¸”ë¡œê·¸ ë°ì´í„°ë¥¼ ê°€ì ¸ì˜¤ëŠ” API í•¨ìˆ˜ë“¤ì„ êµ¬í˜„í•˜ê² ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.

---

```diff
- 
+ import { apiClient, API_ENDPOINTS } from './api';
+ 
+ // íƒ€ì… ì •ì˜
+ export interface Category {
+   id: number;
+   name: string;
+   slug: string;
+   description?: string;
+   created_at: string;
+ }
+ 
+ export interface Tag {
+   id: number;
+   name: string;
+   slug: string;
+   created_at: string;
+ }
+ 
+ export interface Post {
+   id: number;
+   title: string;
+   content: string;
+   summary?: string;
+   slug: string;
+   post_type: 'DEV' | 'ESG';
+   category?: Category;
+   tags: Tag[];
+   is_published: boolean;
+   view_count: number;
+   created_at: string;
+   updated_at: string;
+   author_id: number;
+ }
+ 
+ export interface PostSummary {
+   id: number;
+   title: string;
+   summary?: string;
+   slug: string;
+   post_type: 'DEV' | 'ESG';
+   category?: Category;
+   tags: Tag[];
+   view_count: number;
+   created_at: string;
+   updated_at: string;
+ }
+ 
+ export interface PostListResponse {
+   posts: PostSummary[];
+   total: number;
+   page: number;
+   size: number;
+   pages: number;
+ }
+ 
+ export interface Comment {
+   id: number;
+   post_id: number;
+   author_name: string;
+   author_email?: string;
+   content: string;
+   is_approved: boolean;
+   created_at: string;
+ }
+ 
+ export interface CommentListResponse {
+   comments: Comment[];
+   total: number;
+ }
+ 
+ // ë¸”ë¡œê·¸ API í•¨ìˆ˜ë“¤
+ export const blogApi = {
+   // ì¹´í…Œê³ ë¦¬ ëª©ë¡ ì¡°íšŒ
+   async getCategories(): Promise<Category[]> {
+     const response = await apiClient.get<Category[]>(API_ENDPOINTS.BLOG_CATEGORIES);
+     return response.data;
+   },
+ 
+   // íƒœê·¸ ëª©ë¡ ì¡°íšŒ
+   async getTags(): Promise<Tag[]> {
+     const response = await apiClient.get<Tag[]>(API_ENDPOINTS.BLOG_TAGS);
+     return response.data;
+   },
+ 
+   // ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ëª©ë¡ ì¡°íšŒ
+   async getPosts(params?: {
+     page?: number;
+     size?: number;
+     post_type?: 'DEV' | 'ESG';
+     category_id?: number;
+     search?: string;
+   }): Promise<PostListResponse> {
+     const response = await apiClient.get<PostListResponse>(API_ENDPOINTS.BLOG_POSTS, {
+       params,
+     });
+     return response.data;
+   },
+ 
+   // ê°œë³„ ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ì¡°íšŒ (slug ê¸°ë°˜)
+   async getPostBySlug(slug: string): Promise<Post> {
+     const response = await apiClient.get<Post>(`${API_ENDPOINTS.BLOG_POSTS}/${slug}`);
+     return response.data;
+   },
+ 
+   // ê°œë³„ ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ì¡°íšŒ (ID ê¸°ë°˜)
+   async getPostById(id: number): Promise<Post> {
+     const response = await apiClient.get<Post>(`${API_ENDPOINTS.BLOG_POSTS}/${id}`);
+     return response.data;
+   },
+ 
+   // ê²Œì‹œê¸€ ëŒ“ê¸€ ì¡°íšŒ
+   async getPostComments(postId: number, approvedOnly = true): Promise<CommentListResponse> {
+     const response = await apiClient.get<CommentListResponse>(
+       `${API_ENDPOINTS.BLOG_COMMENTS}/post/${postId}`,
+       {
+         params: { approved_only: approvedOnly },
+       }
+     );
+     return response.data;
+   },
+ 
+   // ëŒ“ê¸€ ì‘ì„± (ì¸ì¦ í•„ìš”)
+   async createComment(data: {
+     post_id: number;
+     content: string;
+     author_name: string;
+     author_email?: string;
+   }): Promise<Comment> {
+     const response = await apiClient.post<Comment>(API_ENDPOINTS.BLOG_COMMENTS, data);
+     return response.data;
+   },
+ };
+ 
+ // í—¬ìŠ¤ì²´í¬ API
+ export const healthApi = {
+   // API Gateway í—¬ìŠ¤ì²´í¬
+   async checkHealth(): Promise<{ status: string; service: string; version: string }> {
+     const response = await apiClient.get(API_ENDPOINTS.HEALTH);
+     return response.data;
+   },
+ 
+   // ì „ì²´ ì„œë¹„ìŠ¤ ìƒíƒœ í™•ì¸
+   async checkStatus(): Promise<{
+     gateway: string;
+     services: Record<string, { status: string; status_code?: number; error?: string }>;
+   }> {
+     const response = await apiClient.get(API_ENDPOINTS.STATUS);
+     return response.data;
+   },
+ }; 
```

## ğŸ”„ **Step 4: React Query ì„¤ì •**

React Queryë¥¼ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ì—¬ ë°ì´í„° í˜ì¹­ê³¼ ìºì‹±ì„ ê´€ë¦¬í•˜ê² ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.

---

```diff
- 
+ import { QueryClient } from '@tanstack/react-query';
+ 
+ // Query Client ìƒì„±
+ export const queryClient = new QueryClient({
+   defaultOptions: {
+     queries: {
+       retry: 3,
+       staleTime: 5 * 60 * 1000, // 5ë¶„
+       gcTime: 10 * 60 * 1000, // 10ë¶„ (ì´ì „ cacheTime)
+       refetchOnWindowFocus: false,
+     },
+     mutations: {
+       retry: 1,
+     },
+   },
+ });
+ 
+ // Query Keys (ìºì‹œ í‚¤ ê´€ë¦¬)
+ export const queryKeys = {
+   // í—¬ìŠ¤ì²´í¬
+   health: ['health'] as const,
+   status: ['status'] as const,
+   
+   // ë¸”ë¡œê·¸
+   categories: ['blog', 'categories'] as const,
+   tags: ['blog', 'tags'] as const,
+   posts: (params?: Record<string, any>) => ['blog', 'posts', params] as const,
+   post: (slug: string) => ['blog', 'post', slug] as const,
+   postById: (id: number) => ['blog', 'post', 'id', id] as const,
+   comments: (postId: number) => ['blog', 'comments', postId] as const,
+   
+   // ì¸ì¦
+   user: ['auth', 'user'] as const,
+ } as const; 
```
